I'd give Kano - Made In The Manor a listen
I feel the exact same way. It's way above my expectations and honestly not at all what I expected from the album. Definitely fits the album title.
Yeah the singing doesn't sound bad at all, glad he's able to pull off both rapping and singing.

To those of you who aren't able to listen to the album yet, you should be able to in around 30 minutes. (Midnight UK time)
Edit: Currently listening to the album and actually surprised to hear Stormzy sing in a few tracks, not bad at all.Definitely enjoying it so far and I'm about halfway through. Really glad he didn't just turn out to be a one-hit wonder.
Edit 2: So I've finished the album. Honestly way above my expectations and not what I expected at all. I recommend each and every single one of you to listen to the full thing to soak it all in. There wasn't any track that I really disliked, in my opinion they were all great. The title of the album also definitely fits it well. My personal favorites are Blinded By Your Grace Pt. 2, Return of the Rucksack, Bad Boys, Don't Cry For Me, Lay Me Bare and of course Shut Up.
An EP, not an album but yeah. Ima have a listen to it.

WRITING.TITLE: Uhm... Can anyone explain my rank?
WRITING.TEXT: So basically I just did my placements this season. I barely played in season 2, I just did my placements there and that was about it, I got played around 2900 SR. This season I did my placements and got 3250 even though I lost 7 of my placements, drew one and won 2. This doesn't make any sense to me, I heard there was something wrong with placements but is it really that bad? I don't want to brag but I did perform well in my placements, but with 7 losses I did not expect such a high rank.
I feel you bro

I've played the deck a bit with Finja and Wickerflame. Wickerflame is great imo, a good counter for aggro. Finja I'm not too sure about, he's either an insane tempo swing, or he just messes everything up late game.
Shouldn't take out a pyro, if you're going to remove things then remove aldor, acolyte or one forbidden healing.

You got a list for that? I haven't played rogue like at all but would like to play some fun decks

http://www.hearthpwn.com/decks/622600-legend-reynad-tempo-rogue - Try it out! I feel like the list will be even better with small time buccaneer, it's not the greatest deck but people don't expect it and it's quite fun imo. I personally play it without Xaril and don't really think it's needed.

Reynad actually played an aggro rogue a few months ago and got top 200 legend with it, I've been playing it too and it's quite good. It's pretty much just about going face and you can have some insane burst with evic, cold blood, leeroy etc. Also put in 2 stranglethorn tigers for almost always guaranteed 5 damage.
If it's more of a control meta in the tournament then try out Renolock, it crushes a lot of control decks.

The thing is, you can't do anything about cards like Yogg, Tuskarr or Barnes, they can just win you games on the spot and there's not really a way to play around them. Sure, there are cards like Ragnaros which are random but that's not the same.
Reynad made [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bdkGNrkJsII) video some time ago talking about good and bad RNG, because not all RNG is bad.

He has also said on stream that he will most likely be banning Tuskarr Totemic from Tempo Storm hosted tournament, which imo is a great move since Yogg, Barnes are Tuskarr are way too random and could just win you the game.
